# This file is autogenerated
title: signPreparedCalls
description: Overview of the signPreparedCalls method
slug: wallets/reference/alchemy/wallet-apis/functions/signPreparedCalls
---

Signs prepared calls using the provided signer.

## Import

```ts
import { signPreparedCalls } from "@alchemy/wallet-apis";
```

## Usage

```ts
// Prepare a user operation call.
const preparedCalls = await client.prepareCalls({
  calls: [
    {
      to: "0x1234...",
      data: "0xabcdef...",
      value: "0x0",
    },
  ],
});

// Sign the prepared calls.
const signedCalls = await client.signPreparedCalls(preparedCalls);

// Send the signed calls.
const result = await client.sendPreparedCalls(signedCalls);
```

## Parameters

### signerClient

`SignerClient`

- The wallet client to use for signing

### params

`SignPreparedCallsParams`

- The prepared calls with signature requests

## Returns

`Promise<SignPreparedCallsResult>`
A Promise that resolves to the signed calls
